documentType: US Marshals Service Order to Produce
summary: This document consists of two US Marshals Service orders to produce a prisoner from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York to court on August 6, 2021. The first order is for a 0900 court schedule, and the second is for a 1000 court schedule. The prisoner's name is redacted.

events.title: Court Transport Order
events.description: A US Marshal orders the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York to produce a prisoner for transport to court. Two separate orders are issued for 0900 and 1000 court schedules.

locations: MCC NEW YORK, 150 PARK ROW, NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: A prisoner was scheduled for court transport from MCC New York on August 6, 2021.
Two separate US Marshals Service orders were issued for the same day, one for a 0900 court schedule and another for a 1000 court schedule.
The prisoner's name and details are fully redacted in the document.
The document is part of the Epstein case data set, suggesting the prisoner is likely connected to the Epstein investigation or related proceedings.
The orders are standard USMS forms used for transporting federal prisoners to court appearances.
